Headings

Specifies heading. Use h# or class .-h#
# - number 1..6

Heading 1

Heading 2

Heading 3

Heading 4

Heading 5
Heading 6
<h1>Heading 1</h1>
<h2>Heading 2</h2>
<h3>Heading 3</h3>
<h4>>Heading 4</h4>
<h5>Heading 5</h5>
<h6>Heading 6</h6>

Injections inside headings

Use size classes
_tiny, _small, _minor, _normal, _major, _normal, _big, _huge, _divine
Specifies heading injection.

Heading 4 tiny injection

Heading 4 small injection

Heading 4 minor injection

Heading 4 normal injection

Heading 4 major injection

Heading 4 big injection

Heading 4 huge injection

Heading 4 divine injection
